steam bending kit could not be more
simple there's a single hose that
connects the steamer to the box then all
you need to do is fill the reservoir up
with water and turn it on this kit acts
like a humidifier on steroids and pumps
a ton of heat and steam into this box as
a rule of thumb you want to make sure
your box is over 200 degrees and to let
your board steam for one hour for every
inch of thickness a really convenient
way to measure that is to just drill a
quick hole and insert a meat thermometer
into the top of your box like I
mentioned my box was a little bit

a lot better cut
